archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.4.5b: b) reviewing external security ratings obtained from specialised tools that automate the collection and analysis of data from multiple sources, relating to insecure or out-of-date technologies, network protocols or device configuration
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
